Joking aside here's a incredibly short version:
After my little pony was "stolen" from tumblrites tumblr now views steven universe as "theirs", even though tumblrites don't account for even 1/100th of the viewers for steven universe, so Seth of EqD tried to make a steven universe blog and thus tumblr lost their fucking minds.

Tl:dr; tumblrites, "*EVERYTHING* belongs to us and if you steal it from us we'll send you death threats!"

topics.body:
You know; I just thought of the critical flaw with minecraft mods: most minecraft mods make doing basic shit more complex rather than simpler.

How do you chop down a tree in vanilla minecraft?  Punch it.
How do you chop down a tree in modded minecraft?  Well first you mine, then you take twenty different ores, then you set up a power energy system, then you set up a sorting system, then you make a tree cutter then you create a stable energy system and power the system so as to cut down the tree.


It's bloody stupid is what it is.  That would be like making a robot specifically designed to open doors rather than open a door yourself.
